original_title: A Little Bit of... Hanky Panky
overview: Two young, married couples are on a camping holiday on the island. Only Sylvia, one of the wives, knows the island's secret ... There are lots of surprises and plenty of pretty girls. Filmed entirely on location in the South Pacific.
tagline: The greatest sex game of them all!
title: A Little Bit of... Hanky Panky
